column4: Transmission downloads in a maximum of 5-7KB/s, then drops.. Everything  works fine on windows etc, what may be wrong?
could be internet seeders lan, router anythign?
Seed is fine, my router should be fine
its frankly unlikely to be ubuntu,
Some settings could surely screw things up
then its very unlikely to be the OS, do u use a proxy
well i cant think of anything then
I haven't forwarded my linux ports
Is it nothing more than forwarding them in the router, no screwing in ubuntu?
i believe things like that would be either on or off...
try it but i doubt it would have much effect, it would either connect or not#
